Welcome

This is a public revision + games hub for Edexcel Music Technology (AS & A Level). It’s beginner-friendly, but there’s extra depth when you’re ready. No fluff. Minimal nonsense.

How to use this site

  • Use the sidebar to jump between sections.
  • Use the search bar to find terms, topics, resources, and exam prompts.
  • Printables are A4 and designed to actually be useful (wild concept).

  • Component 2: Technology-based Composition (NEA)
  • Component 3: Listening & Analysing (Exam)
  • Component 4: Producing & Analysing (Exam)

What this site covers

Signal flow, mics, synthesis, MIDI, sampling, EQ, dynamics, mixing, mastering, creative FX + a bit of history.
